title: Mixed-ligand copper(II)-diimine complexes of 3-formylchromone-N4-phenyl thiosemicarbazone: 5,6-dmp co-ligand confers enhanced cytotoxicity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31704-31722
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04997G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anjaneyulu Mamindla, Dhanashree Murugan, Manikandan Varadhan, Tamilarasan Ajaykamal, Loganathan Rangasamy, Mallayan Palaniandavar, Venugopal Rajendiran
The higher DNA binding ability, lipophilicity, reversible CuII/CuI redox behavior, and ability to oxidatively cleave DNA and to produce ROS confers on the 5,6-dmp complex remarkable cytotoxicity (IC50, 1.26 μM) against HeLa cervical cancer cells.
